About¶

gutSMASH is an algorithm that enables to systematically evaluate the metabolic potential of anaerobic bacteria by predicting both known and novel anaerobic Metabolic Gene Clusters (MGCs). This tool is specifically designed to uncover MGCs are involved in specialized primary metabolism from the gut microbiome that have been associated to microbe-microbe and host-microbe interactions. To be able to detect these clusters, gutSMASH uses detection rules logic, as antiSMASH, that are Pfam combination that are defining of a specific reaction. For more information on how to use gutSMASH you can also visit our online documenation in: webserver About page!!!

How to run gutSMASH¶

  • You can try out gutSMASH by using our online webserver: XXXXXXXX

  • or download and install the gutSMASH command line version from here: https://github.com/victoriapascal/antismash/tree/gutsmash

How to cite¶

If you have found gutSMASH useful, please cite:

  • MAIN GUTSMASH PAPER

  • GUTSMASH WEBSERVER

gutsmash.docs
